articles.title: Kim Jong Il sends autograph to ministry officials
Gift to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il
   Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a gift from the chairperson of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia  on the occasion of his birthday.   The gift was handed to an official concerned by chairperson Sazhi Umalatova on a visit to Korea.

articles.title: Enlarged plenary meeting of Korean Buddhist Federation held
articles.content:
Enlarged plenary meeting of Korean Buddhist Federation held
   Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- An enlarged plenary meeting of the central committee of the Korean Buddhist Federation took place here on Feb. 18.
   The meeting discussed the tasks of Buddhists to carry into practice the proposal of a joint meeting of the DPRK government, political parties and organizations.
   The reporter and speakers said that the proposal of the joint meeting for setting this year as a "year of national independence and great unity," honestly implementing the three principles of national reunification and independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity and holding wide-ranging dialogue between the north and south is a very just proposal that reflects all the fellow countrymen's aspiration and desire for reunification. They expressed full support and approval of it.   
   If a genuine dialogue for reunification is to be held between the north and south, the South Korean authorities should take practical steps, before anything else, for discontinuing "cooperation" with outside forces, stopping joint military exercises with them, repealing the "National Security Law" and providing pro-reunification patriotic organizations and personages with freedom of reunification movement and activities, they said, adding:   The South Korean authorities should not vociferate about "dialogue without conditions" but show their sincerity in implementing priorities.
   The meeting declared that all the Buddhists at home and abroad would maintain national independence and wage a powerful struggle, rallied close under the banner of great unity in order to make a new breakthrough in achieving national reunification this year. The meeting adopted a relevant decision.

articles.title: 3rd Kimjongilia show closes
articles.content:
3rd Kimjongilia show closes
    Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The 3rd Kimjongilia show,  which opened on last Saturday on the occasion of the 57th birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, closed on Thursday with due ceremony.   Letters of commendation were given to different units,  which distinguished themselves in successfully ensuring the show, at the closing ceremony.      Chairman Jang Chol of the Korean Kimjongilia Federation  in his address said the successful show clearly proved that the greatness of the respected Marshal Kim Jong Il, who has made great contribution to accomplishing the cause of socialism of Juche and global independence, is something shining most brilliantly and that all the people warmly revere him.   The show imbued the Korean people with the firm confidence that the Korean socialism is invincible as long as it is led by Marshal Kim Jong Il who opened bright future of building a powerful nation, he said.   A public presentation of cultivating experience of Kimjongilia was held at the Pyongyang International House of Culture during the show.

articles.title: Large floral basket to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Large floral basket to Kim Jong Il
   Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a large floral basket from Norodom Sihanouk, Cambodian King,  on the occasion of his 57th birthday.   Upon the authorization of the King, a delegation of the general board of Royal Palace of  Cambodia headed by Kong Sam Ol, deputy prime minister in charge of the Royal Palace, visited the DPRK embassy to lay a large floral basket before the portraits of the President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and pay tribute to them.   His majesty King, the head of the delegation said, extends  wholehearted congratulations and best wishes for longevity to the greatest  leader Marshal Kim Jong Il on the occasion of his 57th birthday, and sincerely wishes him brilliant success in his noble cause of leading the Korean people in the sacred struggle for the prosperity of the country and national reunification.

articles.title: S. Korean authorities denounced for anti-north, anti-reunification diatribe
articles.content:
S. Korean authorities denounced for anti-north, anti-reunification diatribe 
    Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Fatherland (CPRF),  when interviewed by KCNA on February 18 denounced the South Korean authorities for slandering the dignified system in the North Korea, intensifying their anti-north, anti-reunification diatribe.
   On February 12 Chon Yong Thaek, "Minister of National Defense," described the north as "sub-barracks state," during his tour allegedly to examine "military preparedness."
   Earlier, the present chief executive of South Korea said there "would not be reunification" during the term of his office and "efforts would be made to prevent the north from unleashing a war."   
   Those provocative statements clearly show that the South Korean authorities have no intention for inter-Korean dialogue and reunification, but they are imbued with consciousness hostile to the fellow countrymen, the consciousness of confrontation with the north to the marrow, the spokesman said, and continued:   If they truly want reunification and inter-Korean dialogue, they should approach a DPRK-proposed new dialogue prudently and seek pro-north reconciliation instead of a showdown with it.
   Detente between the north and South of Korea and a reunification-oriented dialogue cannot be expected at all as long as Chon Yong Thaek and other hooligans who want confrontation with the north stay in the upper echelon of the military.
   Anti-north hawks such as Chon Yong Thaek should be dislodged.
   If the South Korean authorities keep to the road of division and confrontation, they will be held responsible entirely for all the ensuing consequences.

articles.title: Japan will be held responsible
Yankee murder and S. Korean authorities' sycophantic submission under fire
articles.content:
Yankee murder and S. Korean authorities' sycophantic submission under fire
   Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Korean Student Committee published a statement on Feb. 18 denouncing the South Korean authorities for declaring two U.S. aggression soldiers, who murdered a South Korean student 2 years ago, "not guilty" on the pretext of "insufficient evidence" and "pardoned" them.
   The statement said:   They, putting off legal action against these murderers for two years, recently set them free on the unreasonable pretext of "insufficient evidence".   
   Such treacherous act clearly shows that the U.S. aggression troops and the present authorities of South Korea defending them are the heinous enemies of the nation. The statement bitterly condemned it as an intolerable violation of the nation's dignity.
   The statement further said:   The U.S. aggressors should apologize to the Korean nation for all their crimes in South Korea and withdraw from South Korea at once, with nuclear weapons and all other lethal weapons.
   The South Korean authorities should clearly see the trend of the times and refrain from doing the treacherous acts of tarnishing the dignity and honor of the nation and driving the fellow countrymen to death by clinging to coattails of the U.S.

articles.title: Songs in praise of great man
Collusion with Japanese reactionaries
Japan hell-bent on preparations to reinvade Korea
articles.content:
Japan hell-bent on preparations to reinvade Korea
    Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The Japanese government reportedly confirmed the plan to call out the "self-defence forces" in accordance with the regulation of the "SDF law" providing for its dispatch to the stricken areas"  in case "splinters of missile payloads launched by the DPRK drop on the territory of Japan".
   The plan was also confirmed at the 4th round of the "countermeasure council for major events" held at the Defence Agency of Japan on Feb. 16, a report said.
   This is part of Japan's moves to further expand the theatre of "SDF's" military operations on the pretext of DPRK's "missile threat" and unleash a war against it.
   The regulation of the "SDF law"  allows the director general of the Defence Agency to call out units  in case of "special urgency".   
   The Japanese reactionaries are scheming to dispatch "SDF" without limit by applying the regulation in case of DPRK's "missile launch". They are examining the issue of expanding the theatre of "SDF's" activities on the plea of the missile issue and working out "action guidelines" of the "SDF" on the pretext of "attack of armed guerrillas" and "exodus of refugees".
   The fact shows that their moves to reinvade the Korean peninsula have reached a very dangerous stage.

articles.title: "Evening of Japan, India and Korea" held
Kim Jong Il's powerful nation will be ever prosperous
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's powerful nation will be ever prosperous
   Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The country led by a great leader will certainly become a powerful nation and General Secretary Kim Jong Il is indeed the symbol of a powerful socialist nation and his powerful nation will be ever prosperous.
   So Man Sul, first vice-chairman of the central standing committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), says this in an article contributed to Pyongyang-based papers on the occasion of the February holiday.
   He further says:   When Kim Jong Il declared "Korea, I will glorify thee" during his school days in his teens, he meant Korea would become a powerful nation without parallel, great in ideology and politics, strong and prosperous in the military and economy and beautiful in culture, ethics and morality.   
   Every big power was either a "pseudo big power" or "lame big power" in the true sense of the word in the past history, but a powerful socialist nation being built by the great marshal is the only powerful nation with the greatest might in all aspects of ideology, politics, military affair, economy, culture and morality and a model of an ideal state of humankind which the world will greet in the 21st century.
   Our powerful nation is not a daydream.
   Our homeland has already demonstrated its dignity and reputation to the world as an ideologically powerful nation, a political giant, a militarily powerful nation, a scientifically and technologically powerful nation, a powerful nation in conquering space, a highly civilized country of Juche and a country of morality and sense of obligation.
   When economic goals set by Kim Jong Il are attained, our homeland will take the position of an economically powerful nation and turn into a perfectly  powerful socialist nation desired by humankind.   
   Chongryon has come to advance along the road of prosperity with the homeland under the guidance of the marshal who instills in it great idea and the faith of patriotism, almighty weapon.   The idea of Chongryon is the idea of Kim Jong Il, the spirit of Chongryon is the spirit of absolute worship for Kim Jong Il and the faith of Chongryon is the faith that Kim Jong Il is the greatest.    The historic victory that belongs to the homeland and to Chongryon as well as the homeland and Chongryon which were said to collapse are getting powerful and prosperous and the enemies who were said to win victory were defeated as such miracle as turning a misfortune into a blessing makes a new history which can be created only by Kim Jong Il's powerful nation, a strong nation.

articles.title: U.S. blamed for trying to get "NMB" project into  full stride
articles.content:
U.S. blamed for trying to get "NMB" project into  full stride
   Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Nicholson, chairman of the Republican National Committee of the U.S.,  on February 16 reportedly cried for an "immediate building of 'national missile defense' network to cope with missile attack from North Korea."   His remarks came in response to a statement of a high-ranking official of the Defense Agency of Japan that "North Korea secured ballistic missile technology to hit the U.S. mainland."   Now that there was evidence that North Korea secured missile technology to hit the U.S. mainland, it was necessary that in an effort to "protect the U.S. people" the U.S. administration finish a debate on its necessity and get down to the building of "NMB" network, he argued.    His statement proves that U.S. Hard-line conservatives persistently cry over "missile threat" from North Korea in a bid to step up the modernization of missile force for expansion of the sphere of military domination and make desperate efforts to stifle the DPRK.

articles.title: Irish party leader visits NDFSK mission in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Irish party leader visits NDFSK mission in Pyongyang
   Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- General secretary Rod Eley of the Communist Party of Ireland (Marxist-Leninist) visited the Pyongyang mission of the National Democratic Front of South Korea (NDFSK) on February 18.    Chief Pak Kwang Gi briefed him on activities of NDFSK as well as on a vigorous struggle of the South Korean people for repeal of the "National Security Law" targeted against the nation, reunification and democracy and he said this enjoys support of the international community.   The general secretary said his party has waged a powerful solidarity movement for righteous struggle of the South Korean people for independence, democracy and reunification, and expressed a firm commitment to increase support for the NDFSK activities.

articles.title: Letter of thanks to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Letter of thanks to Kim Jong Il 
   Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a letter of thanks on Feb. 17 from the participants of the 8th International Figure-Skating  Festival.   The letter noted that the whole process of the festival to celebrate his birthday, auspicious holiday common to humankind, was replete with unbounded reverence for him and it contributed to strengthening friendship and solidarity among them.   Kim Jong Il has embraced the Korean people with politics of love and benevolence and led them to turn out in the building of a powerful nation, confident of sure victory, and to vigorously advance towards the 21st century, the letter said.   It expressed the conviction that the Korean people, under the sagacious leadership of Kim Jong Il, will build a powerful nation of Juche despite all temporary difficulties and trials.

articles.title: Wrecked ship and its crew saved
articles.content:
Wrecked ship and its crew saved
   Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Crewmen of a cargo ship "Chongsokjong No. 1" saved a sideline fishing boat, 28 H.P. Iron vessel, and its three crewmen belonging to the Hamhung disabled soldiers ball-point pen factory in South Hamgyong Province from distress in the high seas.    The boat was hit by a typhoon two miles off Hungnam port on January 6.    The boat that had run out of fuel was drifting down south and reaching the high seas near the boundaries of South Korea and Japan 14 days later.   The crew of the ship "Chongsokjong No.1" found the boat on January 20 and rescued the wrecked boat and its crew, braving rough waves 6 metres high.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il praised by Russian writer
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il praised by Russian writer
   Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il is a great marshal, a distinguished great man and a most brilliant commander.   Russian writer Alexandr Brezhnev said this in his poem titled "Supreme Commander Kim Jong Il."
   He continued:   As led by the great marshal, Korea is shining with victory and a balmy spring is ever-lasting.   Kim Jong Il is a distinguished great man, who steers the world and creates history.   He is the great sun of the 21st century who exalts the feats of forerunners for ever, breathes the same with soldiers and infuses strength into the hearts of all people.   Soldiers of the Korean People's Army are replete with the courage of Kim Jong Il. Thanks to them a bright sky of Korea is shining with confetti.   The whole planet pays respects to the ever-victorious commander.

articles.title: Foreign presidents refer to friendly relations with DPRK
articles.content:
Foreign presidents refer to friendly relations with DPRK
    Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Emil Constantinescu, President of Romania, said when he met the Korean ambassador to Romania on Feb. 12 that Korean reunification would be achieved under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Il, Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army, and wished him success in his work for national prosperity.
   When Yemeni President Ali Abdullah Saleh met the Korean ambassador on Feb 11, he wished the Korean people a victory in the work to overcome temporary difficulties and achieve national prosperity and reunification of country.   He said that the two countries established state relations long ago and have since developed friendship and cooperation and the government and people of Yemen would make sustained efforts to strengthen and develop friendly relations with the Korean people.

articles.title: 25 years of Kim Jong Il's work observed
Korean senior officials meet foreign guests
articles.content:
Korean senior officials meet foreign guests
   Pyongyang, February 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, had talks with Hong Sun Huot, deputy secretary general of the Funcinpec Party of Cambodia, who is representative  of this party, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.   Yang Hyong Sop, vice-chairman of the presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, who is chairman of the Korean Social Scientists Society had talks with director general Shuhachi Inoue of the International Institute of the Juche Idea.   Paek Nam Sun met and had talks with the delegation of the Arab Socialist Baath Party of Syria led by Ahmad Kabalan, member of the Regional Leadership and director of the Peasants Department of the Party.
